name: Indiana Rogue
description:
Controls

  • A - Left
  • D- Right
  • Space- Jump (Twice to double)
  • Left mouse- Shoot
  • Arrow Keys can also be used to move
  • W to go through doors

Made for BTP #3

You gain more points the less time you take getting to the final level. Hopefully its a bit difficult.

Credits

  • Character: MoDsama
  • Tileset: AAMATNIEKSS
  • Music: AEYOU
  • Font: Zekronz
